The researcher, if the sky, is a slit, as it said, as it is the sky, if the sky is created [the snake: 1], and on the day the sky is stolen with the dignity [Al -Faraqan: 25] Glory be to him and the sky was opened, and it was doors [Al -Naba: 19] and Sibuyeh sought: ØŽ Al -Farji is the door of the vague, and there is no reason for that, whether it was only.Likely, and the evidence of the etiquette and healing in which there is no homing.
